fields.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-07, New Link Road, Malad (W), Mumbai - 400 064
fields.subject: Issuance of Demand Letter for Surcharge Amount
fields.work_description: The report should be submitted. In this report, if the length of the road increases, it will be mandatory to pay the additional road excavation fee to the Municipal Corporation. As proposed above, a demand letter for a surcharge amount of Rs. 36,53,633/- is being given to M/s. Bharti Airtel Ltd., subject to the terms and conditions of the Municipal Corporation.
references: 1) Application from M/s. Bharti Airtel Ltd. dated 18/09/2025.
2) Approval from the Hon. City Engineer dated 01/10/2025.
fields.road_name: Vasant Valley Road and internal roads - from D Mart Mohan Square 1 to Motiram Sape Road open space

road_measurements_table.road_name: Vasant Valley Road and internal roads - from D Mart Mohan Square 1 to Motiram Sape Road open space

financial_charges_table.description: For laying cable at various locations in Kalyan division.
Ground rent Rs. 10 per meter for 20 years

fields.title: Table No.:- B
fields.total_surcharge_calculation_text: Total surcharge amount A and B = Rs. 3277679.33 + Rs. 376961.88 = 36543632.88
terms_and_conditions: 1. For road excavation, inform the Police City Traffic Branch, Kalyan and work as per their convenience.
2. For laying OFC cable, do not excavate adjacent to the concrete road, but excavate at the side of the road, leaving a minimum distance of 1 foot.
3. Care should be taken to ensure that there is no obstruction to traffic and no accidents occur.

4. After the road excavation work is completed, the excavated soil should be properly filled in the trench and arrangements should be made to lift the remaining soil, so that the road traffic will be smooth.
5. Before excavating the road, contact the concerned department of the said road and start the work as per their consent.

6. Start the road excavation work only after giving prior notice to the Sub-Engineer (Construction Headquarters). After the actual commencement of the road excavation and OFC cable laying work, a weekly report of the started work with photographs should be submitted to the Sub-Engineer (Construction Headquarters). Also, if the said report is found to be unsatisfactory, the Municipal Corporation will have the right to cancel the permission granted to you.
7. You will be fully responsible for any accident or loss of life while excavating the said road.
8. You will be responsible for the repair or compensation for any damage to water pipelines / electric cables / telephone cables etc. while carrying out excavation work for laying cables.

9. While carrying out the excavation work, it will be mandatory to install a board on the actual site showing the information about the work, the name of the excavating agency, as well as the information and telephone number of the engineer of the concerned company.

10. Necessary safety measures should be taken while carrying out the excavation work. For example, installing safety devices, installing barricades, putting up a nameplate regarding the road excavation, and putting up a nameplate showing the company's name. In this regard, if any complaint is received, it should be resolved immediately, otherwise, please note that punitive action will be taken against you.
11. After the road excavation work is actually completed, a re-survey will be conducted by the Sub-Engineer (Construction Headquarters)...
fields.total_amount_in_words: Thirty-six lakh fifty-three thousand six hundred thirty-three only

copy_to.recipient: Hon. City Engineer, Kalyan Dombivli Municipal Corporation, Kalyan

table_rows.description: कल्याण विभागातील विविध ठिकाणी केबल टाकणेकरिता.
भुईभाडे १० रू. प्रति मीटर असे २० वर्षाकरिता

table_rows.road_name: वसंतव्हॅली रोड आणि अंतर्गत रस्ते – डी मार्ट मोहन स्क्वेअर १ ते मोतीराम सापे रोड येथील मोकळी जागा
